Auth.privacyRequired: You must accept the privacy policy
Auth.emailExists: This email address is already registered
Auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
Auth.checkYourEmail: Please check your email to verify your account.
Auth.verificationEmailSent: A verification email has been sent to your inbox.
Auth.emailNotVerified: Your email is not verified. Please check your inbox or resend the verification email.

Discovery.title: Find a game
Discovery.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your filters or check back later.

Session.sessionNotFoundDescription: This session does not exist or has been deleted.
Session.alreadyBooked: You have already booked this session
Session.cancelConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel your booking for this session? Your spot will be given to someone on the waitlist.
Session.bookingConfirmMessage:
By registering for this session, you commit to being present at the scheduled time.

If you cannot attend, please cancel your booking as soon as possible so that your spot can be given to someone on the waitlist.

Repeated no-shows may result in restrictions on your account.
Session.errorAgeRestriction: This session requires a minimum age of {age}. Please update your profile with your birth date.
Session.errorAlreadyBooked: You have already booked this session.

Agenda.title: My Agenda
Agenda.noSessionsDescription: You don't have any sessions yet. Browse available sessions to join one!

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.section1Content: Structura Ludis is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in compliance with GDPR.
Privacy.section2Content: We only collect data necessary for the service to function:
Privacy.section3Content: Your data is used exclusively to allow you to book game sessions, receive notifications about your bookings, and improve your user experience. We never sell your data to third parties.
Privacy.section4Content: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
Privacy.rights1: Right of access: view your personal data
Privacy.rights2: Right to rectification: correct your data
Privacy.rights3: Right to erasure: delete your account and data
Privacy.rights4: Right to portability: export your data
Privacy.section5Content: For any questions about your personal data, you can contact us through your account settings or at privacy@structuraludis.com.

Home.subtitle: Organize and join role-playing game sessions easily. Find your next game in just a few clicks.
Home.noEventsDescription: There are no scheduled events at the moment.
Home.feature1Description: Explore available sessions and find the game that suits you.
Home.feature2Description: Sign up in one click and receive your confirmations by email.
Home.feature3Description: Real-time notifications for changes and reminders.

Exhibition.title: Events
Exhibition.selectEvent: Select an event to see its sessions
Exhibition.noEventsDescription: There are no scheduled events at the moment.

SessionForm.pageDescription: Fill out the form below to propose a new game session for this exhibition.
SessionForm.missingExhibitionDescription: Please select an exhibition to propose a session for.
SessionForm.invalidPlayerRange: Min players cannot exceed max players
SessionForm.durationTooShort: Duration must be at least 30 minutes
SessionForm.sessionTitlePlaceholder: Enter a title for your session
SessionForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your session (setting, scenario, what to expect...)
SessionForm.descriptionHelper: Optional. Help players understand what your session is about.
SessionForm.minAgeHelper: Leave empty if no age restriction
SessionForm.accessibleSession: This session is accessible for people with disabilities
SessionForm.safetyToolsDescription: Select the safety tools you will use during your session.
SessionForm.noSafetyToolsAvailable: No safety tools configured for this exhibition.
SessionForm.submitError: Session created but submission failed. Please try again from your dashboard.
